question: who won so you think you can dance season 13
api_result: The winner of "So You Think You Can Dance" Season 13, also known as "So You Think You Can Dance: The Next Generation," was Kida Burns (Kida The Great). This season, which aired in 2016, featured younger dancers ranging in age from 8 to 13. Kida Burns was 14 years old when he won the competition.
